platform.core.profile.category.notifications=通知 notifications.filters.cancel=取消 notifications.filters.submit=保存 notifications.filters.type.label=过滤类型： notifications.filters.type.hint=过滤器应如何处理指定位置的事件 notifications.filters.location.label=过滤范围： notifications.filters.location.hint=过滤器应该关注Wiki的哪一部分？
## Advanced filters options notifications.settings.filters.advanced=高级过滤选项 notifications.filters.advanced.toggles.hint=默认情况下会激活这些过滤器，您可以使用过滤器旁边的按钮以禁用它们。 notifications.filters.advanced.toggles.table.name=过滤器名称 notifications.filters.advanced.toggles.table.description=描述 notifications.filters.advanced.toggles.table.toggle=切换 notifications.filters.advanced.modal.close=关闭
## Filters names notifications.filters.name.systemUserNotificationFilter=系统过滤器 notifications.filters.description.systemUserNotificationFilter=隐藏系统用户的通知 notifications.filters.name.ownEventsNotificationFilter=自己的事件过滤器 notifications.filters.description.ownEventsNotificationFilter=隐藏有关您自己活动的通知 notifications.filters.name.eventReadAlertFilter=读取事件过滤器（警报） notifications.filters.description.eventReadAlertFilter=隐藏标记为已读的通知 notifications.filters.name.eventReadEmailFilter=读取事件过滤器（电子邮件） notifications.filters.description.eventReadEmailFilter=隐藏标记为已读的通知 notifications.filters.name.minorEventAlertNotificationFilter=小事件（警报） notifications.filters.description.minorEventAlertNotificationFilter=隐藏有关页面上的微小更改的通知 notifications.filters.name.minorEventEmailNotificationFilter=小事件（电子邮件） notifications.filters.description.minorEventEmailNotificationFilter=隐藏有关页面上的微小更改的通知
## Translation keys for the scopeNotificationFilter notifications.filters.preferences.scopeNotificationFilter.name=范围通知过滤器 notifications.filters.preferences.scopeNotificationFilter.page=仅限页面 notifications.filters.preferences.scopeNotificationFilter.space=页面和子项 notifications.filters.preferences.scopeNotificationFilter.wiki=Wiki ### Missing: notifications.filters.preferences.scopeNotificationFilter.user=User
## Notifications toggles notifications.toggle.disabled.hint=如果您想监视这些位置，则需要在设置中启用通知
## Notifications formats notifications.format.alert=警报 notifications.format.email=邮件 notifications.filters.preferences.delete.inProgress=删除中... notifications.filters.preferences.delete.done=过滤器偏好已删除！ notifications.filters.preferences.delete.error=删除过滤器偏好失败 notifications.filters.preferences.setEnabled.inProgress=保存中... notifications.filters.preferences.setEnabled.done=过滤器偏好已保存！ notifications.filters.preferences.setEnabled.error=保存过滤器偏好失败 notifications.filters.preferences.allEvents=-
## System Filter preferences settings notifications.settings.filters.preferences.system.title=系统过滤器 notifications.settings.filters.preferences.system.hint=您可以开关系统过滤器来更细粒度地控制您想要接收的通知。 ## Header definition for notification filter preferences ### Missing: notifications.settings.filters.preferences.system.table.name=Name ### Missing: notifications.settings.filters.preferences.system.table.filterDescription=Description ### Missing: notifications.settings.filters.preferences.system.table.filterType=Description ### Missing: notifications.settings.filters.preferences.system.table.notificationFormats=Formats ### Missing: notifications.settings.filters.preferences.system.table.isEnabled=Is enabled?
## Custom Filter preferences settings notifications.settings.filters.preferences.custom.title=自定义过滤器 notifications.settings.filters.preferences.custom.hint=创建过滤器来控制您要接收的通知。 ## Header definition for notification filter preferences ### Missing: notifications.settings.filters.preferences.custom.table.filterPreferenceId=Identifier ### Missing: notifications.settings.filters.preferences.custom.table.scope=Scope ### Missing: notifications.settings.filters.preferences.custom.table.location=Location ### Missing: notifications.settings.filters.preferences.custom.table.filterType=Filter Action ### Missing: notifications.settings.filters.preferences.custom.table.eventTypes=Events ### Missing: notifications.settings.filters.preferences.custom.table.notificationFormats=Formats ### Missing: notifications.settings.filters.preferences.custom.table.isEnabled=Is enabled? ### Missing: notifications.settings.filters.preferences.custom.table._actions=Actions notifications.filters.type.custom.inclusive=为事件产生通知 ### Missing: notifications.filters.type.custom.exclusive=Ignore the event notifications.settings.addFilter=添加过滤器 ### Missing: notifications.settings.addFilter.hint=Create a filter for events happening on specific locations. The filter can trigger the sending of a notification or prevent one from being sent, depending on the event and the notification channel. ### Missing: notifications.filters.preferences.custom.addFilter.location.label=Location ### Missing: notifications.filters.preferences.custom.addFilter.location.hint=This filter applies on the events happening on the locations selected here. Select one or more locations. ### Missing: notifications.filters.preferences.custom.addFilter.type.label=Action notifications.filters.preferences.custom.addFilter.type.hint=此过滤器可以通知或忽略所选 Location 上发生的事件。选择您要对事件采取的操作。 notifications.filters.preferences.custom.addFilter.filterType.inclusive=为事件产生通知 ### Missing: notifications.filters.preferences.custom.addFilter.filterType.exclusive=Ignore the event ### Missing: notifications.filters.preferences.custom.addFilter.notificationFormat.label=Channel ### Missing: notifications.filters.preferences.custom.addFilter.notificationFormat.hint=This filter applies only to the notifications sent on the communication channels selected below. Choose one or more communication channels. ### Missing: notifications.filters.preferences.custom.addFilter.eventType.label=Events ### Missing: notifications.filters.preferences.custom.addFilter.eventType.hint=This filter applies to the events selected here, in the locations selected above. Choose one or more events. notifications.menu.header=通知 notifications.menu.header.settings=设置 notifications.menu.clear=清空所有 notifications.menu.clearing=正在清除通知 notifications.menu.cleared=通知已被清除 notifications.settings.title=通知首选项 notifications.settings.error.notAdmin=您需要成为管理员才能看到这一点。 notifications.settings.menu=通知菜单 notifications.settings.menu.hint=通知菜单位于页面的右上角，您可以通过单击铃声图标（{0}）来查看 notifications.settings.email=电子邮件 notifications.settings.email.forGuest=登录或注册以处理您的通知设置。 notifications.settings.email.disabled=通知电子邮件已禁用。请联系您的管理员。 notifications.settings.email.hint=系统会定期向您发送一封电子邮件，其中包含Wiki上发生的情况摘要 notifications.settings.email.title=Email首选项 notifications.settings.email.frequency=电子邮件频率 notifications.settings.email.frequency.hint=选择您希望收到电子邮件的频率，其中包含Wiki上发生的内容摘要。 notifications.settings.email.diffType.hint=选择您希望接收的有关电子邮件中所有更改的详细信息级别。 notifications.settings.saving=您的设置正在保存中...... notifications.settings.saved=已保存！ notifications.settings.savingfailed=保存您的设置失败 notifications.settings.filters=过滤器（{0}） notifications.settings.errorFilterWiki=错误：您必须选择Wiki，而不是页面 notifications.settings.preferences=首选项 notifications.settings.preferences.hint=捕获正在发生的事件并通过流或电子邮件将它们发送出去。 notifications.settings.applications.title=应用 notifications.settings.applications.hint=这是可以发送通知的应用程序列表。您可以启用或禁用其中任何一个。 notifications.settings.applications.forGuest=登录或注册以处理您的通知设置。 notifications.settings.applications.appName=名称 ### Missing: notifications.settings.applications.table.dropdown.toggle.label=Toggle the details for notifications from the {0} application. notifications.settings.events=事件 notifications.settings.watch.title=已监视页面 notifications.settings.watch.autowatchmode=自动监视页面 notifications.settings.watch.autowatchmode.hint=在您完成工作后决定是否要监视页面 notifications.settings.watch.forGuest=登录或注册以处理您的通知设置。 notifications.settings.watch.disabled=已监视的实体被禁用，请联系您的管理员。 notifications.events.by=由{0}编辑。 notifications.events.lastChange=最后更改：{0}。 notifications.events.lastComment=最后评论：{0}。 notifications.preferences.scope.table.scope=范围 notifications.preferences.scope.table.location=位置 notifications.preferences.scope.table.scopeFilterType=过滤器类型 notifications.preferences.scope.table._actions=操作 notifications.email.title=wiki上的事件： notifications.email.subject=Wiki上的{0}个事件 notifications.email.seeChanges=更改：{0} notifications.email.linkDetails=查看详情 notifications.rss.feedLink=RSS订阅 notifications.rss.feedLinkDescription=通知的事件订阅源 notifications.rss.feedTitle=通知RSS提要 notifications.rss.feedDescription=此RSS源可以在您的个人资料页面上自定义。 notifications.rss.seeChanges=更改：{0} ### Missing: notifications.rss.defaultTitleWithPage=New event on {0} ### Missing: notifications.rss.defaultTitle=New event notifications.globalsettings.email=通知电子邮件 XWiki.Notifications.Code.NotificationEmailPreferenceClass_interval_daily=每天 XWiki.Notifications.Code.NotificationEmailPreferenceClass_interval_hourly=每小时 XWiki.Notifications.Code.NotificationEmailPreferenceClass_interval_weekly=每周 ### Missing: XWiki.Notifications.Code.NotificationEmailPreferenceClass_interval_live=Live XWiki.Notifications.Code.NotificationEmailPreferenceClass_diffType=更改的详细信息 XWiki.Notifications.Code.NotificationEmailPreferenceClass_diffType_NOTHING=没有 XWiki.Notifications.Code.NotificationEmailPreferenceClass_diffType_STANDARD=标准 XWiki.Notifications.Code.AutomaticWatchModeClass_automaticWatchMode_NONE=从不 XWiki.Notifications.Code.AutomaticWatchModeClass_automaticWatchMode_ALL=每次我做一个修改 XWiki.Notifications.Code.AutomaticWatchModeClass_automaticWatchMode_MAJOR=每次我做一个重大修改 XWiki.Notifications.Code.AutomaticWatchModeClass_automaticWatchMode_NEW=只有当我创建一个新页面时
## Common notification settings errors ### Missing: notifications.settings.error.userReferenceNotSupported=The given user reference is not supported, only DocumentUserReference are supported for now. ### Missing: notifications.settings.error.userReferenceAdminForbidden=You don't have administration right for the given user: {0}. ### Missing: notifications.settings.error.badCSRF=Bad CSRF token. ### Missing: notifications.settings.badParameters=Bad request parameters.
## User profile notifications.userprofile.following=已关注 notifications.userprofile.notfollowing=未关注 notifications.userprofile.follow=开始关注 notifications.userprofile.unfollow=停止关注 notifications.userprofile.done=完成 notifications.userprofile.saving=保存中... notifications.userprofile.error=保存通知设置时出错
## Macros description rendering.macro.notificationsApplicationsPreferences.name=通知应用程序偏好 rendering.macro.notificationsApplicationsPreferences.description=显示当前用户关于通知应用程序的偏好。 rendering.macro.notificationsApplicationsPreferences.parameter.target.name=目标 rendering.macro.notificationsApplicationsPreferences.parameter.target.description=宏的目标（可以是当前用户的“用户”或当前Wiki的“wiki”） rendering.macro.notificationsAutoWatchPreferences.name=通知自动监视偏好 rendering.macro.notificationsAutoWatchPreferences.description=显示当前用户关于自动监视页面的偏好。 rendering.macro.notificationsAutoWatchPreferences.parameter.target.name=目标 rendering.macro.notificationsAutoWatchPreferences.parameter.target.description=宏的目标（可以是当前用户的“用户”或当前wiki的“wiki”）
## Toggle notification filters labels notifications.filters.preferences.label.page=仅切换页面通知 notifications.filters.preferences.label.space=切换页面和子通知 notifications.filters.preferences.label.wiki=切换Wiki通知
## Notifications switches notifications.switches.tooltip.page=监视该页面 notifications.switches.tooltip.pageAndChildren=监视该页面及其所有子页面 notifications.switches.tooltip.space=监视父页面及其所有子页面 notifications.switches.tooltip.wiki=监视该Wiki notifications.switches.changeStatusError=无法更改通知的状态。
## Watch button and modal
notifications.watch.button.title=此页面的当前通知设置：{0}- 单击以更改它 notifications.watch.button.status.notset=没有设置 notifications.watch.button.status.followed=已关注 notifications.watch.button.status.blocked=已屏蔽 notifications.watch.button.status.custom=自定义关注 notifications.watch.modal.title=此页面的通知设置 notifications.watch.modal.description.options=您可以使用以下选项更改当前通知设置: notifications.watch.modal.description.ancestoroption=您可以转到 {0} 并在那里修改通知设置，也可以使用以下选项直接在当前页面上应用设置： notifications.watch.modal.title.WATCHED_FOR_ALL_EVENTS_AND_FORMATS=关注页面的通知设置 notifications.watch.modal.description.WATCHED_FOR_ALL_EVENTS_AND_FORMATS=您正在关注此页面：您将收到它的通知。 ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.title.WATCHED_BY_ANCESTOR_FOR_ALL_EVENTS_AND_FORMATS=Followed page by parent watch settings ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.description.WATCHED_BY_ANCESTOR_FOR_ALL_EVENTS_AND_FORMATS=You are following this page through a parent in the hierarchy: you will receive notifications for it. ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.title.WATCHED_WITH_CHILDREN_FOR_ALL_EVENTS_AND_FORMATS=Followed page and children watch settings notifications.watch.modal.description.WATCHED_WITH_CHILDREN_FOR_ALL_EVENTS_AND_FORMATS=您正在关注此页面及其子页面：您将收到它的通知。 notifications.watch.modal.title.NOT_SET=未设置监视设置 notifications.watch.modal.description.NOT_SET=您尚未配置监视此页面的任何设置，因此您没有关注此页面：您不会收到有关它的通知。 ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.title.BLOCKED_FOR_ALL_EVENTS_AND_FORMATS=Blocked page watch settings notifications.watch.modal.description.BLOCKED_FOR_ALL_EVENTS_AND_FORMATS=您忽略此页面：您不会收到任何通知。 ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.title.BLOCKED_BY_ANCESTOR_FOR_ALL_EVENTS_AND_FORMATS=Blocked page by parent watch settings ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.description.BLOCKED_BY_ANCESTOR_FOR_ALL_EVENTS_AND_FORMATS=You are ignoring this page through a parent in the hierarchy: you won't receive any notifications for it. ### Missing: notifications.watch.modal.title.BLOCKED_WITH_CHILDREN_FOR_ALL_EVENTS_AND_FORMATS=Blocked page and children watch settings notifications.watch.modal.description.BLOCKED_WITH_CHILDREN_FOR_ALL_EVENTS_AND_FORMATS=您忽略了此页面及其子页面：您不会收到任何通知。 notifications.watch.modal.title.CUSTOM=自定义监视设置 notifications.watch.modal.description.CUSTOM=您正在使用此页面的自定义通知设置：您可能正在关注或阻止页面的特定事件，或者您可能仅针对通知的特定渠道。我们邀请您查看个人资料中的通知设置。 notifications.watch.modal.option.watchpage.title=关注当前页面 notifications.watch.modal.option.watchpage.hint=您将仅收到该页面的通知。 notifications.watch.modal.option.watchspace.title=关注当前页面及其子页面 notifications.watch.modal.option.watchspace.hint=您将收到该页面及其子页面的通知。 notifications.watch.modal.option.watchwiki.title=关注整个维基 notifications.watch.modal.option.watchwiki.hint=此选项不仅会影响当前页面或空间：您将收到 wiki 中任何页面的通知。 notifications.watch.modal.option.blockpage.title=屏蔽当前页面 notifications.watch.modal.option.blockpage.hint=您将仅屏蔽该页面的任何通知。 notifications.watch.modal.option.blockspace.title=屏蔽当前页面及其子页面 notifications.watch.modal.option.blockspace.hint=您将屏蔽该页面及其所有子页面的任何通知。 notifications.watch.modal.option.unwatchpage.title=取消关注当前页面 notifications.watch.modal.option.unwatchpage.hint=您将仅停止接收该页面的通知。 notifications.watch.modal.option.unwatchspace.title=取消关注当前页面及其子页面 notifications.watch.modal.option.unwatchspace.hint=您将停止接收有关该页面及其子页面的通知。 notifications.watch.modal.option.unwatchwiki.title=取消关注整个维基 notifications.watch.modal.option.unwatchwiki.hint=此选项不仅会影响当前页面或空间：您将停止接收维基中任何页面的通知。 notifications.watch.modal.option.unblockpage.title=取消屏蔽当前页面 notifications.watch.modal.option.unblockpage.hint=您将仅收到该页面的通知。 notifications.watch.modal.option.unblockspace.title=取消屏蔽当前页面及其子页面 notifications.watch.modal.option.unblockspace.hint=您将收到该页面及其子页面的通知。 notifications.watch.modal.option.unblockwiki.title=取消屏蔽整个维基 notifications.watch.modal.option.unblockwiki.hint=此选项不仅会影响当前页面或空间：您将停止忽略维基中任何页面的通知。 notifications.watch.modal.close=关闭（不保存） notifications.watch.modal.savechanges=保存更改 notifications.watch.modal.gotosettings=管理所有通知设置
## Filter preferences settings notifications.settings.filters.preferences.title=过滤器 notifications.settings.filters.preferences.hint=创建过滤器以更精确地控制活动事件何时应触发通知。 notifications.settings.filters.preferences.forGuest=登录或注册以处理您的通知过滤器。
## Header definition for notification filter preferences notifications.settings.filters.preferences.table.name=名称 notifications.settings.filters.preferences.table.filterType=过滤器类型 notifications.settings.filters.preferences.table.eventTypes=事件 notifications.settings.filters.preferences.table.notificationFormats=格式 notifications.settings.filters.preferences.table.isEnabled=确定要启用？ notifications.settings.filters.preferences.table._actions=操作 notifications.filters.preferences.addPreference.filterType.inclusive=包含的 notifications.filters.preferences.addPreference.filterType.exclusive=独占 notifications.filters.preferences.addPreference.notificationFormat.label=通知格式 notifications.filters.preferences.addPreference.notificationFormat.hint=该过滤器应采用哪种格式的通知？ notifications.filters.preferences.addPreference.eventType.label=事件类型 notifications.filters.preferences.addPreference.eventType.hint=过滤器应该针对哪种事件类型？ notifications.filters.preferences.addPreference.location.label=过滤范围 notifications.filters.preferences.addPreference.location.hint=过滤器应该针对哪个页面？
## Filter Types notifications.filters.type.inclusive=包括的 notifications.filters.type.exclusive=独家
## until 16.2.0RC1 ### Missing: notifications.settings.filters.preferences.custom.table.description=This table lists every custom filter registered for the given user or current wiki. ### Missing: notifications.settings.filters.preferences.system.table.description=This table lists every system filter registered in the wiki. ### Missing: notifications.settings.filters.preferences.custom.table.name=Location
